messages.content: Girl I went to school with was killed like this.
Well 216 is out now and Im crying. [NAME] why?
I feel so bad for [NAME]. It was probably hard to concentrate on this match with the things going on in his personal life
I never understood the part where he dives into a pile of money, even as a child. It seems wildly painful.
Must be a tough life when all you can think about is sad stories to keep you from enjoying anything.
My husband and I have been circling the drain for years. :(
Sadly enough I was thinking the same.
Sadly there's a good chance that you still need a car anyway because that affordable neighborhood will involve a one hour commute.
She had really bad chronic back pain from what I can remember, so was self treating with alcohol
No, what’s sad is saying the same message like it’s news. He’s a copy paste machine. No original thought.
This is exactly what it's been like. I feel personally victimised by it all
I can relate. It kind of breaks your heart and your spirit, doesn’t it?
This hits hard, sadly both of my relationships have been toxic so I've decided not to start any new ones until I start going to uni
Please post any news you may find about her fate. This is so sad and so wrong. We need to know what happens to her.
It still hurts 15 years later. I don't know how people can be so callous their own child
My dad wears that sweater every game day! It’s in much worse condition however
This is so cringey it hurts. I feel so bad for whoever sent this because they are so stupid.
I always feel so bad for [NAME] when I watch this scene.
Oh boy do I have some bad news for you!
Gah sad high five. I tried once for a few weeks and will never try again. I need that support in my life.
I am trying they try to say I’m fake even though I’m trying it’s painful to talk to them sometimes
That's sad. I'm 16 and where I am there are loads of athiests my age. It's great.
Help me [NAME] I'm bully in high school for no reason.
I literally just finished watching the second episode of Daredevil. This pains me
I'm just really sad all that cake was wasted.
I really pity those unfree Cuban babies. It’s just sad.
The comments on this thread are what I expected and that makes me sad.
It's real enough sadly. Kin have been around for awhile in their own corners of the net.
Gonna be sad when Gameday is inside a gym for shooty hoops. I already miss CFB :(
